Package controller

Class ViewReports

java.lang.Object
controller.ViewReports
public class ViewReports extends Object
The ViewReports class manages the report tables of the application.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ViewReports.totalsReport
    Inner class representing a totals report to be utilized by a report table

    • apDataByContactComboBox

      public void apDataByContactComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Updates the table view based on the selected value from the contact combo box. If All is selected sets all appointments in the table view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event of contact combo box.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during the data retrieval.

    • loadTotalsReportTable

      public void loadTotalsReportTable(javafx.collections.ObservableList<ViewReports.totalsReport> totalsList, javafx.scene.control.TableView<ViewReports.totalsReport> theTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> byWhat, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> howMany)
      Loads data into a totals report table.
      Parameters:
      totalsList - The list of totals to be displayed in the table.
      theTable - The table to populate with data.
      byWhat - The column representing the 'by what' aspect in the table.
      howMany - The column representing the 'how many' aspect in the table.
